newsitem.title: USA: Carey says completes limousine acquisition.
newsitem.headline: Carey says completes limousine acquisition.

text.p: Carey International Inc said Wednesday it had completed its acquisition of Manhattan International Limousine Network Ltd and Affiliate, a New York-based provider of chauffered vehicle services.
The company did not give the terms of the transaction.
Manhattan Limousine had revenues of about $18.4 million in 1996, the company said.
Carey, which went public last week in a $30.5 million deal, offers chauffered vehicle services through a worldwide network spanning 420 cities.
